definition: a short passage added at the end of a literary work
details:
noun
- a short passage added at the end of a literary work
= example: a short passage added at the end of a literary work
= synonyms: epilog
- a short speech, often in verse, addressed directly to the audience by an actor at the end of a play
= example: a short speech, often in verse, addressed directly to the audience by an actor at the end of a play
= synonyms: epilog
